alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 1:27PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cumberland County through 200 PM EDT... At 127 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cumberland, or 7 miles north of Portland, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cumberland, Falmouth, Freeport, Yarmouth, Harpswell, Durham, Chebeague Island, Pownal, and North Yarmouth. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 11 and 23. Interstate 95 between mile markers 52 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland
